info.title: Prividium™ Permissions API
info.description: API for managing user permissions, roles and access control in the ZKsync Prividium™ ecosystem

get.description: List roles with pagination

post.description: Create a new role

get.description: Get a role by name
List users with pagination and filtering

post.description: Create a new user

get.description: Get a user by ID
List contracts grouped by template. Returns template groups (with counts) followed by ungrouped contracts.

post.description: Create a new contract

get.description: List contracts for a specific template with pagination
Get a contract by address
List contract permissions with pagination

post.description: Create a new contract permission

get.description: Get a contract permission by contract address and method selector

put.description: Replace a contract permission by method selector (full update). The method and contract pointed by the permission cannot be changed.

delete.description: Delete a contract permission by method selector

get.description: List templates with pagination

post.description: Create a new template

get.description: Get a template by id
List template permissions with pagination

post.description: Create a new template permission

get.description: Get a template permission by id

put.description: Replace a template permission (full update). The method and template pointed by the permission cannot be changed.

get.description: Lists existing event permissions with pagination

post.description: Create a new event permission

get.description: Get an event permission by id

post.description: Creates a new tenant

get.description: Search tenants with pagination
Get tenant by id
Get users for a tenant
List audit logs with pagination and filtering
Get audit logs for a specific user
Get audit logs by action type
Get recent audit logs (last 24 hours)
Get all available audit action types
Returns a paginated list of applications

post.description: Creates a new application

get.description: Searches an application by id
List active sessions for a specific user (admin only)

post.description: Revoke a specific session by ID
Revoke all sessions for a specific user
Creates a new service

get.description: List services with pagination
Get service by id
Get own user profile

post.description: Generate a SIWE message for wallet association
Associate a wallet with the current user after signature verification

get.description: List all wallets associated with the current user

delete.description: Remove a wallet association from the current user

get.description: List active sessions for current authenticated user

post.description: Revoke a specific session by ID
Revoke all sessions except the current one

get.description: Get personal RPC token for the authenticated user

post.description: Invalidate current RPC token and generate a new one
Enable RPC for a specific transaction with calldata and nonce for 1 hour
Enable RPC for a specific transaction for 1 hour

get.description: Returns data for the current tenant

post.description: Creates a user associated with the current tenant

get.description: Returns the list of users associated with current tenant

post.description: Associates given wallet with user
allows a service to check if a user has full read access
Login with OIDC
Login with Crypto Native
Tenant login
Service login
Logout

get.description: Get current session information

post.description: creates a siwe message to login as a tenant
creates a siwe message to login as a service

get.description: Check if a contract is disclosing bytecode
Checks if a given contract supply is disclosed to the public
Returns tx hash if it was already registered

post.description: Checks if the current token can perform a certain transaction
Verifies current given address is the sender in the allowance
Update the transaction hash for an allowance (no JWT required)
